meanings.definition: To unscramble or decode a message or signal.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy descrambling secret codes in my spare time.
meanings.sent2: She is descrambling the encrypted file to reveal its contents.
meanings.sent3: The detective was descrambling the mysterious note to uncover the hidden message.
meanings.sent4: Descrambling the jumbled letters of the word is like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: Descrambling the signal was the key to understanding the radio transmission.

meanings.definition: The act of rearranging or unscrambling something.
meanings.sent1: Descrambling of the letters helped me form a meaningful word.
meanings.sent2: The descrambling of the puzzle pieces revealed a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent3: The descrambling of the seating arrangement caused chaos at the event.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like a descrambling machine as she organized the information.
meanings.sent5: The descrambling of the code was a satisfying challenge for the students.
